member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: M:MDD4All.SpecIF.Microservice.Controllers.HierarchyController.GetAllHierarchies(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets all hierarchies.

member.name: M:MDD4All.SpecIF.Microservice.Controllers.HierarchyController.GetHierarchyById(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a hierarchy with a specific ID.
member.param: The maximum depth of child nodes to return. If not set the complete hierarchy depth is returned.

member.name: M:MDD4All.SpecIF.Microservice.Controllers.HierarchyController.GetAllHierarchyRevisions(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets all revisions from a hierarchy with a specific ID.
member.param: The maximum depth of child nodes to return. If not set the complete hierarchy depth is returned.

member.name: M:MDD4All.SpecIF.Microservice.Controllers.HierarchyController.CreateNewHierarchy(MDD4All.SpecIF.DataModels.Node,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.param: An optional parent node ID. The sub-tree will be inserted as first child.
An optional predecessor node ID. The sub-tree will be inserted after the specified node.
The project ID. If the ID is given, the new hierarchy will be added to the specific project. Only useful for new hierarchies - no parent or predecessor given.

member.name: M:MDD4All.SpecIF.Microservice.Controllers.HierarchyController.UpdateHierarchy(MDD4All.SpecIF.DataModels.Node,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Updates an existing hierarchy node. The supplied ID must exist somewhere in any hierarchy. Query ?parent=nodeId - the sub-tree will be moved and inserted as first child; query ?predecessor=nodeId - the sub-tree will be moved and inserted after the specified node. Without query string, the node (sub-tree) is not moved.
member.param: An optional parent node ID. The sub-tree will be inserted as first child.
An optional predecessor node ID. The sub-tree will be inserted after the specified node.

member.name: M:MDD4All.SpecIF.Microservice.Controllers.HierarchyController.DeleteHierarchy(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a hierarchy.

member.name: M:MDD4All.SpecIF.Microservice.Controllers.ProjectController.GetAllProjects
member.summary: Returns all projects; to limit the size only root properties are delivered.

member.name: M:MDD4All.SpecIF.Microservice.Controllers.ProjectController.GetProjectByID(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the project with the given ID.
member.param: An optional comma seperated list of hierarchy root node IDs to limit the output of selected hierarchies.
Set to true if the metadata should be included (e.g. resource classes etc.)

member.name: M:MDD4All.SpecIF.Microservice.Controllers.ProjectController.CreateNewProject(MDD4All.SpecIF.DataModels.SpecIF,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a project with supplied elements; the supplied ID must be unique in the project scope. If no ID is supplied, it is created before insertion.
member.param: The SpecIF data defining the project.

member.name: M:MDD4All.SpecIF.Microservice.Controllers.ProjectController.UpdateProject(MDD4All.SpecIF.DataModels.SpecIF)
member.summary: Updates a project with the given ID by including the data into an existing project. The project with the supplied ID must exist.

member.name: M:MDD4All.SpecIF.Microservice.Controllers.ProjectController.DeleteProject(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a project with the given ID.
member.param: The ID of the project to delete.

member.summary: Returns all resources with all available revisions.
member.param: An optional project ID. The endpoint then returns only resources for the given project.

member.summary: Returns the latest version of the resource with the given ID.

member.name: M:MDD4All.SpecIF.Microservice.Controllers.ResourceController.GetAllResourceRevisions(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of all revisions for the resource with the given ID.
member.returns: All available revisions for this resource.

member.name: M:MDD4All.SpecIF.Microservice.Controllers.ResourceController.AddNewResource(MDD4All.SpecIF.DataModels.Resource,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new resource to the SpecIF repository.
member.description: The new resource is added as a new element with a specific revision and a specific branch, depended on the given information. The new resource element is returned as response.
member.param: The optional project ID. If a project ID is not given, the data is added to a default project.

member.name: M:MDD4All.SpecIF.Microservice.Controllers.ResourceController.UpdateResource(MDD4All.SpecIF.DataModels.Resource)
member.summary: Updates a resource. The ID included in the resource data must exist.

member.summary: Deletes the resource.
member.param: ?mode=forced results in deleting all directly and indirectly dependant model elements.

member.name: M:MDD4All.SpecIF.Microservice.Controllers.StatementController.GetAllStatements(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all statements with all available revisions. With the optional project ID only the statements for the project are returned.
member.param: The optional project ID to filter statements by project.
The optional object ID to filter statements only targeting the element with the given ID.
An optional object revision. Only useful together with object ID.
The optional subject ID to filter statements only sourcing the element with the given ID.
An optional subject revision. Only useful together with subject ID.

member.name: M:MDD4All.SpecIF.Microservice.Controllers.StatementController.GetStatementById(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the statement with the given ID.

member.summary: Returns all available revisions for the statement with the given ID.

member.summary: Creates a statement; the supplied ID must be unique in the project scope.

member.name: M:MDD4All.SpecIF.Microservice.Controllers.StatementController.UpdateStatement(MDD4All.SpecIF.DataModels.Statement)
member.summary: Updates a new statement. If a statement with the given ID is existant, a new revision is created automatically.
member.returns: The created statement data (perhaps with modified revision data).

member.summary: Deletes the statement; the supplied ID must exist. Returns an error if there are dependant model elements.
